work.title: Senior SW Developer
description: I am responsible for the Electronic Department internal strategic tool to configure and personalize appliance software
I am defining processes, requirements, analysis of data and tools to best suit to each need
Responsible for standardizing the best practices and the best processes among different cross appliances electronic organizations
Leading the standardization of processes, taking the Best of Best and defining standards. Working Customer oriented for the common Mission

âž• Company Ambassador: Responsible for creating a positive and productive work environment as an active member of the Engagement Team, organizing Team Building activities to keep people engaged and committed
bestaccomplishment: I created the Cross Team Synergy value

We have different electronic departments in the same company, one each type of product line. Since they are autonomous, each of them was working with no visibility or interest in how other parallel departments were doing. They did things differently, and often a problem in a department was happening in others too. They were struggling on the same issues, they were replicating the same job and the company was wasting resources.
I started to collect information and put people work together, having them able to share their processes and best practices, their daily work, their issues and achievements to other departments.

I have been able to put all the departments working together as they realized the value of working as a Team of Teams. Departments still work autonomously and each of them have their own responsibility, but now they can count on others ! Itâ€™s been approximately 4 years since our very first meeting and we still meet once a month to grow together.

work.title: Junior SW Developer
description: Started as a software developer and gathering experience also in Project Management, my role is various and reach of activities
Working from Concept through delivery in the Research & Innovation department

Working cross-functionally in collecting data, analyzing scenarios and patterns, defining requirements and developing algorithms applications in the field of -preventive maintenance- and -early Fault discovery
IoT Designs, coding and testing, documenting, build/install, performing analysis on software Requirements
Responsible for HW and SW Suppliers engagement Responsible for European Funded projects
Responsible for End-of-Line test applications in Factories
bestaccomplishment: Field Test of our new smart electronic board in 50 united-states customers
Technicians do not know which is the broken part of an appliance when they are called by customers, so they have to go back a second time bringing materials. This is a waste of energy.

We built a prototype called â€˜cubeâ€™ to connect to each and every model of appliance to collect data from machines and, using a smart algorithm data analyzer, to be able to understand which part of an appliance was broken and even predict faults.
As the final phase of the project, we built the â€˜cubeâ€™ that was installed in 50 American houses.

I was responsible for the â€˜Field testâ€™ in all the phases, from recruiting customers, assurance and privacy papers, installation phase, the field test itself, customer assistance, collection on analysis of data.
The Field test project gave my company a huge visibility to the actual multinational american company that was working with us and different other projects were started after this.

work.title: Director Assistant 1999 - Jesi (AN)
description: My first work experience, a small family-run office. I learned a lot working in contact with the public, becoming very thorough and meticulous from the very beginning ! Precision and quality of the work and right time.
bestaccomplishment: With my IT experience and knowledge of the most common SW tools and applications I have contributed to the digitalization of this small business, automating many tasks that were previously performed manually, improving accuracy, results and drastically reducing times.
